note:
Just another late 30s soul trying to survive each day of increasing wtfuckery without completely losing it. I make art, currently attempting to learn the ropes of 3d with blender despite ai staring me down saying I can do that! Faster AND better! Gimme dat prompt!

*Not as bitter as this makes me sound.
*Sometimes I'm witty.
*It's ok to laugh at the process pieces I share. I have too usually after raging and cursing my laptop.
*Please say hi! Always down to connect with awesome people ðŸ˜€
